incidents.name: On Call Engineers are Investigating an issue affecting user and chat services in one of our support centers

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated an issue affecting user and chat services in one of our support centers, and it was determined that there is no noticeable customer impact. All systems are operational.

Our monitoring systems have detected an issue affecting user and chat services in one of our support centers, resulting in elevated 5xx errors. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will provide updates as soon as more information becomes available.
